articles.title: Florida researchers track COVID mutation that suggests virus is adapting to humans - WITI FOX 6 Milwaukee
articles.description:
TAMPA, Fla. (FOX 13) --  Researchers in Florida are tracking a mutation in the COVID-19 virus that makes it better at infecting human cells.
